problem_text_cn: 如图,从⊙O外一点P引圆的切线PA和PB,切点分别是A和B,如果∠APB=70°,那么这两条切线所夹劣弧AB的度数是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the tangents PA and PB of a circle drawn from a point P outside ⊙O, the tangent points are A and B respectively, if ∠APB = N_0, then the degree of the minor arc AB sandwiched by these two tangents is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵PA和PB是切线,∴∠A=∠B=90°,∵∠APB=70°,∴∠AOB=180°-∠P=110°,∴劣弧AB的度数是110°．故选:A．
